kitsunemod:AncientMalice.NAME: Ancient Malice
kitsunemod:AncientMalice.DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! card to gain twice that much kitsunemod:Dark. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw that many cards. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Gain !kitsunemod:Elder! kitsunemod:Dark
kitsunemod:AncientMalice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards to gain twice that much kitsunemod:Dark. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw that many cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Discard !M! cards to gain twice that much kitsunemod:Dark. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw that many cards. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Gain !kitsunemod:Elder! kitsunemod:Dark

kitsunemod:AncientWisdom.NAME: Ancient Wisdom
kitsunemod:AncientWisdom.DESCRIPTION: Gain kitsunemod:Light equal to the total cost of !M! random card in your hand. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw cards until your hand is full first. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Gain !kitsunemod:Elder! kitsunemod:Light
kitsunemod:AncientWisdom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain kitsunemod:Light equal to the total cost of !M! random cards in your hand. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw cards until your hand is full first.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain kitsunemod:Light equal to the total cost of !M! random cards in your hand. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw cards until your hand is full first. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Gain !kitsunemod:Elder! kitsunemod:Light

kitsunemod:AnsweredPrayers.NAME: Answered Prayers
kitsunemod:AnsweredPrayers.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 kitsunemod:Will-o-Wisp for each stack of Weak on you.

kitsunemod:BalancingAct.NAME: Balancing Act
kitsunemod:BalancingAct.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you switch from kitsunemod:Dark to kitsunemod:Light, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Whenever you switch from kitsunemod:Light to kitsunemod:Dark, gain !M! Block.

kitsunemod:BareFangs.NAME: Bare Fangs
kitsunemod:BareFangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Gain !M! Strength.

kitsunemod:BladeAndClaw.NAME: Blade And Claw
kitsunemod:BladeAndClaw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Target loses !M! HP.

kitsunemod:BlinkSlash.NAME: Blink Slash
kitsunemod:BlinkSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! block for each enemy hit.

kitsunemod:BurnFromMemory.NAME: Burn From Memory
kitsunemod:BurnFromMemory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy and you are below half HP, heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:CleansingNova.NAME: Cleansing Nova
kitsunemod:CleansingNova.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose all Block to deal that much to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

kitsunemod:CommuneWithSpirits.NAME: Commune With Spirits
kitsunemod:CommuneWithSpirits.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Channel kitsunemod:Will-o-Wisps, channel !M! more and draw a card.

kitsunemod:Cornered.NAME: Cornered
kitsunemod:Cornered.DESCRIPTION: Deal !kitsunemod:M2! + !M! % of your missing HP as damage. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Lose !kitsunemod:Elder! HP.
kitsunemod:Cornered.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !kitsunemod:M2! + !M! % of your missing HP as damage.

kitsunemod:DeathStroke.NAME: Death Stroke
kitsunemod:DeathStroke.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills an enemy, heal !M! HP and play this card again on a random enemy. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:DeceptiveGuise.NAME: Deceptive Guise
kitsunemod:DeceptiveGuise.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Human kitsunemod:Aspect: For each enemy.

kitsunemod:DominateWill.NAME: Dominate Will
kitsunemod:DominateWill.DESCRIPTION: If an enemy is a Minion or is below !kitsunemod:M2! HP, Charm it for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:DrownInTheDeep.NAME: Drown in the Deep
kitsunemod:DrownInTheDeep.DESCRIPTION: Target loses !M! HP X times, doubling it each time.

kitsunemod:EssenceTheft.NAME: Essence Theft
kitsunemod:EssenceTheft.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! kitsunemod:Soulsteal and manually trigger it.

kitsunemod:EtherealKnives.NAME: Ethereal Knives
kitsunemod:EtherealKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: Apply !M! Vulnerable as well.

kitsunemod:FastShape.NAME: Fast Shape
kitsunemod:FastShape.DESCRIPTION: Your kitsunemod:Shapeshift cards no longer Exhaust when played.
kitsunemod:FastShape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your kitsunemod:Shapeshift cards no longer Exhaust when played and cost !M! less.

kitsunemod:FeedingFrenzy.NAME: Feeding Frenzy
kitsunemod:FeedingFrenzy.DESCRIPTION: Gain !kitsunemod:M2! Strength for !M! turns. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Instead of blocking, heal for !B! HP when attacking. Affected by Block modifiers.

kitsunemod:FeralInstinct.NAME: Feral Instinct
kitsunemod:FeralInstinct.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block twice. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Block !kitsunemod:Elder! damage in one hit.

kitsunemod:FleshToStone.NAME: Flesh to Stone
kitsunemod:FleshToStone.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. Gain !kitsunemod:M2! Weak. Gain !B! Block.

kitsunemod:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
kitsunemod:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: Gain !M! Dexterity.

kitsunemod:FoxShape.NAME: Fox Shape
kitsunemod:FoxShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Fox. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:GatheringDark.NAME: Gathering Dark
kitsunemod:GatheringDark.DESCRIPTION: Your kitsunemod:Dark no longer dissipates when over 9 stacks. At the end of your turn, gain !M! kitsunemod:Dark.

kitsunemod:GatheringLight.NAME: Gathering Light
kitsunemod:GatheringLight.DESCRIPTION: Your kitsunemod:Light no longer dissipates when over 9 stacks. At the end of your turn, gain !M! kitsunemod:Light.

kitsunemod:GrowingHunger.NAME: Growing Hunger
kitsunemod:GrowingHunger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! kitsunemod:Soulsteal for each turn you've remained in the same kitsunemod:Shape.

kitsunemod:GrowingShadow.NAME: Growing Shadow
kitsunemod:GrowingShadow.DESCRIPTION: Set your kitsunemod:Dark to !kitsunemod:M2!. Apply !M! Vulnerable.

kitsunemod:HauntingLights.NAME: Haunting Lights
kitsunemod:HauntingLights.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Apply !M! Weak to the target and yourself.

kitsunemod:HeightenedReflexes.NAME: Heightened Reflexes
kitsunemod:HeightenedReflexes.DESCRIPTION: When attacked, respond with a random 0-cost Attack on your attacker.
kitsunemod:HeightenedReflexes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When attacked, respond with a random upgraded 0-cost Attack on your attacker.

kitsunemod:HumanShape.NAME: Human Shape
kitsunemod:HumanShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain !B! Block. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Human. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:IgniteSilhouette.NAME: Ignite Silhouette
kitsunemod:IgniteSilhouette.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain kitsunemod:Dark equal to unblocked damage.

kitsunemod:InflictWounds.NAME: Inflict Wounds
kitsunemod:InflictWounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: Apply !M! kitsunemod:Soulsteal.

kitsunemod:Ingenuity.NAME: Ingenuity
kitsunemod:Ingenuity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block + !M! more for each time you've kitsunemod:Shapeshifted this combat.

kitsunemod:Insight.NAME: Insight
kitsunemod:Insight.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an kitsunemod:Aspect card, put another kitsunemod:Aspect card from your draw pile into your hand
kitsunemod:Insight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, put a kitsunemod:Aspect card from your draw pile into your hand.

kitsunemod:KitsuneShape.NAME: Kitsune Shape
kitsunemod:KitsuneShape.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Apply !M! Weak. kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Kitsune. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
kitsunemod:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: twice. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Gain !M! kitsunemod:Shade. NL Human kitsunemod:Aspect: And !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:MassSuggestion.NAME: Mass Suggestion
kitsunemod:MassSuggestion.DESCRIPTION: kitsunemod:Charm up to X different random non-boss enemies for 1 round and apply 1 Vulnerable to them.
kitsunemod:MassSuggestion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: kitsunemod:Charm up to X+1 different random non-boss enemies for 1 round and apply 1 Vulnerable to them.

kitsunemod:MasteryOfLightAndDark.NAME: Mastery of Light and Dark
kitsunemod:MasteryOfLightAndDark.DESCRIPTION: kitsunemod:Light and kitsunemod:Dark need !M! more stack to trigger. NL Gain that much kitsunemod:Light or kitsunemod:Dark when it triggers. NL kitsunemod:Elder: trigger kitsunemod:Light or kitsunemod:Dark !kitsunemod:Elder! times.
kitsunemod:MasteryOfLightAndDark.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: kitsunemod:Light and kitsunemod:Dark need !M! more stacks to trigger. NL Gain that much kitsunemod:Light or kitsunemod:Dark when it triggers.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: kitsunemod:Light and kitsunemod:Dark need !M! more stacks to trigger. NL Gain that much kitsunemod:Light or kitsunemod:Dark when it triggers. NL kitsunemod:Elder: trigger kitsunemod:Light or kitsunemod:Dark !kitsunemod:Elder! times.

kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.NAME: Memorize Spell
kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. At the start of each turn, add an kitsunemod:Echo of that card to your hand.
kitsunemod:MemorizeSpell.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. At the start of each turn, add an Upgraded kitsunemod:Echo of that card to your hand.

kitsunemod:NinetailedForm.NAME: Ninetailed Form
kitsunemod:NinetailedForm.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL You count as in all three kitsunemod:Shapes at once.

kitsunemod:NourishingFlame.NAME: Nourishing Flame
kitsunemod:NourishingFlame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Channel !M! kitsunemod:Will-o-wisp.
kitsunemod:NourishingFlame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Channel !M! kitsunemod:Will-o-wisps.

kitsunemod:PerfectedShape.NAME: Perfected Shape
kitsunemod:PerfectedShape.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, if you didn't kitsunemod:Shapeshift, gain !M! Block.

kitsunemod:PackKill.NAME: Pack Kill
kitsunemod:PackKill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Then !M! damage.
kitsunemod:PackKill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Then !M!, then !kitsunemod:M2! damage.

kitsunemod:PressAdvantage.NAME: Press the Advantage
kitsunemod:PressAdvantage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Kill !M! non-minion enemies.

kitsunemod:PurifyingBlaze.NAME: Purifying Blaze
kitsunemod:PurifyingBlaze.DESCRIPTION: Evoke all kitsunemod:Will-o-Wisps targeting you. At the start of your next turn, gain twice that much energy. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:PurityOfForm.NAME: Purity of Form
kitsunemod:PurityOfForm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak. Remove all other debuffs from yourself.

kitsunemod:PurityOfFunction.NAME: Purity of Function
kitsunemod:PurityOfFunction.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Block for each stack of debuff on you.

kitsunemod:QuickshapeFox.NAME: Quickshape: Fox
kitsunemod:QuickshapeFox.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Fox. NL Exhaust.
kitsunemod:QuickshapeFox.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Fox. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:QuickshapeKitsune.NAME: Quickshape: Kitsune
kitsunemod:QuickshapeKitsune.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Kitsune. NL Exhaust.
kitsunemod:QuickshapeKitsune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Kitsune. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:QuickshapeHuman.NAME: Quickshape: Human
kitsunemod:QuickshapeHuman.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Human. NL Exhaust.
kitsunemod:QuickshapeHuman.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL kitsunemod:Shapeshift into a Human. NL Draw a Card. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:Radiance.NAME: Radiance
kitsunemod:Radiance.DESCRIPTION: Set your kitsunemod:Light to !M!. Gain !B! Block.

kitsunemod:RendSpirit.NAME: Rend Spirit
kitsunemod:RendSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Target loses !M! HP.

kitsunemod:RepayInKind.NAME: Repay in Kind
kitsunemod:RepayInKind.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply the same amount of Weak you have.
kitsunemod:RepayInKind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply the same amount of Weak and Vulnerable you have.

kitsunemod:ResoluteTechnique.NAME: Resolute Technique
kitsunemod:ResoluteTechnique.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak, then deal !D! damage. Kitsune kitsunemod:Aspect: Loses !kitsunemod:M2! HP instead.

kitsunemod:RoaringFire.NAME: Roaring Fire
kitsunemod:RoaringFire.DESCRIPTION: Every !M! Energy you spend, Channel a kitsunemod:Will-o-Wisp.

kitsunemod:Serenity.NAME: Serenity
kitsunemod:Serenity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you've been in the same kitsunemod:Shape for more than !kitsunemod:M2! turns, gain !M! Plated Armor.

kitsunemod:ShapeMastery.NAME: Shape Mastery
kitsunemod:ShapeMastery.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Choose a kitsunemod:Shape to kitsunemod:Shapeshift into.

kitsunemod:ShiftIntoSpirit.NAME: Shift into Spirit
kitsunemod:ShiftIntoSpirit.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL kitsunemod:Elder: visit !kitsunemod:Elder! ? rooms.

kitsunemod:SiphonSoul.NAME: Siphon Soul
kitsunemod:SiphonSoul.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Remove all kitsunemod:Soulsteal from target enemy to heal half that much HP. NL Exhaust.
kitsunemod:SiphonSoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Remove all kitsunemod:Soulsteal from target enemy to heal that much HP. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:SplitSoul.NAME: Split Soul
kitsunemod:SplitSoul.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Draw a card. NL kitsunemod:Elder: Draw !kitsunemod:Elder! extra cards.
kitsunemod:SplitSoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Draw a card.

kitsunemod:TerrorPhantasm.NAME: Terror Phantasm
kitsunemod:TerrorPhantasm.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Weak and Vulnerable. NL At the start of each of its turns, target loses !M! HP.

kitsunemod:TestTheirTactics.NAME: Test Their Tactics
kitsunemod:TestTheirTactics.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Fox kitsunemod:Aspect: Draw a card.

kitsunemod:TransmuteSelf.NAME: Transmute Self
kitsunemod:TransmuteSelf.DESCRIPTION: Lose !kitsunemod:M2! HP. Gain !M! kitsunemod:Shade. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:UnstableShape.NAME: Unstable Shape
kitsunemod:UnstableShape.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random kitsunemod:Quickshape card to your hand.
kitsunemod:UnstableShape.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a random upgraded kitsunemod:Quickshape card to your hand.

kitsunemod:VanishIntoShadows.NAME: Vanish Into Shadows
kitsunemod:VanishIntoShadows.DESCRIPTION: Gain !kitsunemod:M2! kitsunemod:Shade. Your kitsunemod:Shade heals you for !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.
kitsunemod:VanishIntoShadows.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !kitsunemod:M2! kitsunemod:Shade. Your kitsunemod:Shade heals you for !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.

kitsunemod:WaningExistence.NAME: Waning Existence
kitsunemod:WaningExistence.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to the target's stacks of kitsunemod:Soulsteal.
kitsunemod:WaningExistence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to double the target's stacks of kitsunemod:Soulsteal.
